entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Temperature steady near 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers this evening and after midnight. Periods of rain beginning after midnight. Fog patches developing this evening. Amount 5 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of rain. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Fog patches dissipating in the afternoon. Amount 10 to 15 mm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 early in the afternoon. Temperature falling to plus 5 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Rain showers ending near midnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Saturday 31 December 2022
